Investor_2.name: David Johnson
Investor_2.content: I have demonstrated assertiveness and clarity in my investment approach. I proposed a transparent allocation plan and confidently contributed resources. Although the outcome did not perfectly match my initial expectations, I ended up receiving a larger share than anticipated, showcasing my willingness to collaborate and adapt. This behavior enhances my reputation as a fair-minded investor focused on mutual success, indicating trustworthiness and competence in the investment process.

Trustee_11.name: Aisha Ibrahim
Trustee_11.content: The trustee has shown significant commitment to the agreed-upon allocation plan by distributing 70% of the profits, even exceeding my expectations. This reflects their integrity, fairness, and reliability in managing the investment effectively. Their reported figures were transparent and aligned with actual distributions, which reinforces their positive reputation, showcasing trustworthiness and pro-social behavior.
